title: Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura Review
description:
From the creators of the original Fallout games comes Arcanum. A fantasy RPG about the dynamics between technology and magic, and the endless despicability of gnomes.
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/MandaloreGaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
Big thanks to @branzoles for his artistic contributions.
